description: 22 moments across 7 days covering all 8 types: session_chunk, voice_note, content_upload, image, meeting, note, file, observation. Each references a session by name (resolved to UUID by seed script).

moments._comment: Day 1 (today) â€” standup session chunk
moments.name: jamie-standup-chunk-0
moments.summary: Morning standup: Reviewed API v2 migration status (60% complete), discussed Sarah's iOS SDK deadline, and triaged blockers around auth endpoints and rate limiting.

moments._comment: Day 1 â€” voice note (gradient thumbnail + audio player)
moments.name: jamie-onboarding-voice
moments.summary: Brainstormed onboarding improvements: progressive disclosure for permissions, 4-step guided tour, and value-first approach. Users who complete onboarding retain 3x better.

moments._comment: Day 1 â€” PDF content upload (icon thumbnail + .PDF badge)
moments.name: jamie-quarterly-report-upload
moments.summary: Uploaded Q1 quarterly report. Revenue $1.2M (+18% QoQ), MAU 50.2K (+32%), churn 3.2% (down from 3.7%), runway 14 months. Enterprise tier driving growth.

moments._comment: Day 2 (yesterday) â€” architecture session chunk
moments.name: jamie-architecture-chunk-0
moments.summary: Deep dive on Redis caching for recommendation engine. Decided on TTL-based eviction (1hr), ~800MB memory budget on r6g.large. Expected 40% latency reduction from P95 340ms.

moments._comment: Day 2 â€” image (network image thumbnail)
moments.name: jamie-whiteboard-photo
moments.summary: Whiteboard sketch of microservices topology: API Gateway (Kong) â†’ Auth Service, Core API, Event Bus (NATS). gRPC for sync, NATS for async events.

moments._comment: Day 3 â€” sprint retro meeting (image thumbnail, 4 persons)
moments.name: jamie-sprint-retro-meeting
moments.summary: Sprint retrospective: Deployment frequency tripled (2â†’6/week). Pain points: flaky integration tests (3 failures), slow PR reviews (2-day average). Action items: test quarantine, 24hr review SLA, staging parity, test dashboard.

moments._comment: Day 3 â€” API migration note (gradient thumbnail)
moments.name: jamie-api-migration-note
moments.summary: API v2 migration plan: 5 breaking changes â€” auth endpoint (PKCE), pagination (cursor-based), error format (RFC 7807), rate limits (per-tier), webhook payloads (CloudEvents). Estimated 6-week timeline.

moments._comment: Day 4 â€” competitive DOCX file (icon thumbnail + .DOCX badge)
moments.name: jamie-competitive-docx
moments.summary: Competitive analysis of Notion AI: Strong in contextual suggestions and inline editing. Weak in voice input and integrations. Our opportunity: structured memory, voice-first interaction, cross-app context.

moments._comment: Day 4 â€” onboarding observation (no thumbnail, 1 person)
moments.name: jamie-onboarding-observation
moments.summary: Mobile onboarding drop-off is 47% at permissions step vs 28% on desktop. Root cause: simultaneous camera/mic/location permission requests. Recommendation: progressive permission requests, expected 40-60% improvement.

moments._comment: Day 4 â€” extra session chunk from competitive session
moments.name: jamie-competitive-chunk-0
moments.summary: Reviewed Notion AI competitive landscape. Identified 3 strategic priorities: voice-to-structured-data pipeline, cross-app context integration, and proactive insights over reactive AI.

moments._comment: Day 5 â€” voice note on mobile (gradient thumbnail)
moments.name: jamie-push-strategy-voice
moments.summary: Voice memo on mobile push notification strategy. Current opt-in rate 45%. A/B test: permission prompt at end of onboarding vs after first value moment. Hypothesis: post-value gets 60%+ opt-in.

moments._comment: Day 5 â€” investor meeting (image thumbnail, 2 persons)
moments.name: jamie-investor-meeting
moments.summary: Investor meeting prep: Key talking points â€” $1.2M revenue (+18% QoQ), 14-month runway, voice-first AI differentiation, 3x deployment velocity. Anticipated questions on retention, CAC/LTV, and hiring plan.

moments._comment: Day 5 â€” PPTX content upload (icon thumbnail + .PPTX badge)
moments.name: jamie-board-presentation
moments.summary: Board presentation draft: Product milestones, user growth metrics, financial projections, and 2026 hiring plan. 12 slides. Needs finance review before finalizing.

moments._comment: Day 6 â€” code review session chunk (no thumbnail)
moments.name: jamie-code-review-chunk-0
moments.summary: Reviewed Marcus's auth module refactor: session-based â†’ JWT with refresh tokens. Approved architecture: 15-min access tokens, Redis blocklist, 82% test coverage. Requested concurrent refresh test and rate limiting.

moments._comment: Day 6 â€” XLSX content upload (icon thumbnail + .XLSX badge)
moments.name: jamie-q2-metrics-upload
moments.summary: Q2 metrics dashboard: DAU 12.4K (+23%), MRR $142K (+18%), enterprise tier 63% of revenue. Concerns: free-to-paid conversion 2.1% (below 3% benchmark), mobile DAU/WAU ratio 0.31.

moments._comment: Day 6 â€” extra observation from metrics analysis
moments.name: jamie-metrics-observation
moments.summary: Two concerning trends in Q2 data: free-to-paid conversion at 2.1% (below 3% target) and mobile engagement lagging desktop (DAU/WAU 0.31 vs 0.48). Both directly addressed by onboarding v2 and push notification work.

moments._comment: Day 7 â€” team planning meeting (no thumbnail, 3 persons)
moments.name: jamie-team-planning-meeting
moments.summary: Sprint planning: Set 4 goals â€” Marcus JWT merge (2d), Sarah iOS SDK (5d), Priya progressive permissions (5d), Marcus Redis staging (3d). OKR check: deployment velocity âœ…, PR review ðŸŸ¡, mobile engagement ðŸ”´.

moments._comment: Day 7 â€” event sourcing note (no thumbnail)
moments.name: jamie-event-sourcing-note
moments.summary: ADR-008: Adopt event sourcing for payments domain only. Postgres-backed event store (no new infra). Benefits: audit trail (SOC 2), temporal queries, replay testing. Risk: eventual consistency mitigated by synchronous projections.

moments._comment: Day 7 â€” extra session chunk from event sourcing discussion
moments.name: jamie-event-sourcing-chunk-0
moments.summary: Evaluated CQRS vs traditional CRUD for payments. Decided on event sourcing with Postgres-backed store. Scoped to payment aggregates only â€” not system-wide. Marcus to review before implementation spike.

moments._comment: Day 2 â€” extra note from architecture session
moments.name: jamie-caching-adr-note
moments.summary: ADR-007: Redis caching for recommendation engine. P95 latency target <200ms (from 340ms). TTL-based eviction at 1hr, ~800MB memory footprint. Approved â€” safe within current r6g.large budget.

moments._comment: Day 3 â€” extra session chunk from API note session
moments.name: jamie-api-note-chunk-0
moments.summary: Documented API v2 breaking changes: auth (PKCE), pagination (cursor), errors (RFC 7807), rate limits (per-tier), webhooks (CloudEvents). Estimated 6-week migration timeline with SDK update as critical path.

moments._comment: Day 1 â€” extra voice processing session chunk
moments.name: jamie-voice-pdf-chunk-0
moments.summary: Processed onboarding voice memo and quarterly report PDF. Key onboarding ideas: progressive disclosure, guided tour, value-first flow. Report highlights: $1.2M revenue, 50.2K MAU, 14-month runway.
